overview: Tiara experienced an event beyond reason. He is often followed by a spirit, which invites him to do good. Tiara was very disturbed by the presence of the spirit because she did not believe in the phenomenon. Even he was considered mentally ill by the surrounding community. Until one day he met a cleric, who then made him start to believe.
title: 2 Batas Waktu: Amanah Isa Al-Masih
